contentrichtext.text: '''U interface''': For basic-rate [[Access network|access]] in an Integrated Services [[Digital data|Digital]] [[Telecommunications network|Network]] ([[Integrated Services Digital Network|ISDN]]) environment, a [[User (telecommunications)|user]]-to-[[network interface]] [[reference point]] that is characterized by the use of a 2-wire-[[loop (telecommunication)|loop]] [[transmission system]] that *conveys [[information]] between the 4-wire user-to-network interface, ''i.e.,'' the S/[[T reference point]], and the [[telephone exchange|local exchange]], *is located in the servicing [[telephone exchange|central office]], and *is not as distance sensitive as a service using a T interface. ==References== *{{FS1037C}} == See also == *[[Up0-interface|U<sub>p0</sub>-interface]] [[Category:ITU-T recommendations]] [[Category:Integrated Services Digital Network]]
